meanings.definition: A substance that induces feelings of euphoria.
meanings.sent1: The new medication acted as a powerful euphoriant, lifting his spirits.
meanings.sent2: She avoided using euphoriants to cope with stress, preferring natural remedies.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun that it felt like a euphoriant was in the air!
meanings.sent4: Music has always been my euphoriant, transporting me to a state of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with colors that seemed like a natural euphoriant.

meanings.sent1: The euphoriant music at the concert made everyone dance with joy.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful scenery had a euphoriant effect on her mood.
meanings.sent3: His euphoriant laughter filled the room, spreading happiness to all.
meanings.sent4: The euphoriant aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The euphoriant feeling of accomplishment after finishing a project was overwhelming.
